mapper.select: SELECT f.* FROM fruit f WHERE f.id = #{id}

SELECT a.name,a.phone,f.fname,f.fdesc,f.fimages,addr.city,addr.village,fpt.type,fpt.price,oi.pricetype,oi.count,oi.orderid FROM orderitem oi INNER JOIN account a on a.id = oi.accountid INNER JOIN fruit f on f.id = oi.productid INNER JOIN orders o on o.id = oi.orderid INNER JOIN address addr on addr.id = o.addressid INNER JOIN fruitpricetype fpt on fpt.id = oi.pricetype WHERE oi.orderid=#{order_id} AND oi.accountid=#{account_id}
